QuestData.Title: The Dead Do Not Forget...
QuestData.Description: Many years ago my family and I were slain in this very spot.$b$bThe saberon you see around you are descended from the tribe that murdered my village. Long have I waited, here in this forgotten place, to see justice brought to the saberon for their crimes.$b$bThe Snarlpaw chief is a boneseer, a saberon who divines the future using the remains of the dead.$b$bCollect the ancient skulls of the Snarlpaw ancestors and place them in the boneseer's cauldron.$b$bLet their own bones fill their cauldron for once!
QuestData.LogDescription: Place 10 Ancient Snarlpaw Skulls in the Boneseer's Cauldron.
QuestData.RewardText: <The boiling cauldron gasps and spurts boiling liquid with each skull that is plunged into the pot.>$b$b<As the last of the skulls is submerged within the bubbling cauldron, you feel the sharp nip of a ghostly breeze upon your skin.>
